portfolios.title: Dine And Match
portfolios.description: I created a PHP file that contains arrays representing all the possible results that will respond to all the combo requests that are sent from the client side with jQuery AJAX technolgy.
portfolios.concept: Dine and Match is a website that allows users find the best wine match for their dinner

My inspiration comes from the Yelp website, which is gathers various restaurant information, including their phone number, location address, website and business hours. My UI Design inspiration comes from a food application, using Windows 8 flat style button design.
portfolios.description: I have contributed my HTML, CSS and Javascript skills into the creation of this web application, focusing on creating a flat-styled and fully functional interface. Also, I experimented with some CSS animations to help enhance the user's experience.
portfolios.title: Oyster Lover

portfolios.concept: Siesta is the app that allows BCIT students find the nap location during the break.
portfolios.description: As a part of the project team, I developed the function that allow the clientside connect to database using Ajax and PHP server script. Also the website users can update and store their personal information.
portfolios.title: Siesta
